metadata.title: CVE-2020-10575 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Janus through 0.9.1. plugins/janus_videocall.cin the VideoCall plugin mishandles session management because a racecondition causes some references to be freed too early or too many times.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10575` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

janus - 1.0.4-1
janus-demos - 1.0.4-1
janus-tools - 1.0.4-1
libjs-janus-gateway - 1.0.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: janus package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.4-1').
